article_node.title: Band's ruthless response after Virgin Australia loses instruments
article_node.summary: The Australian band 19-Twenty faced a travel disaster when Virgin Australia lost their instruments before a major music festival, the Mundi Mundi Bash. In a humorous social media post, they mocked the airline with a fake press release about their 'Gearless Gig Experience,' highlighting the absurdity of performing without their gear. The band expressed their frustration while maintaining a light-hearted tone, garnering support from fans who appreciated their witty response.
